concept.title: What is an SWS.online appointment?
concept.shortdesc: Learn what happens in an SWS.online appointment.

conbody.p: Like our face-to-face consultations, online appointments are collaborative, student-centered conversations about writing. Unlike appointments in Nicholson, where consultants read and discuss your paper when you arrive, SWS.online consultations involve three parts:

ol.li: In mySWS, you will make an appointment for an online chat and will provide your writing and your specific questions.
Ninety minutes before your online chat, a writing consultant will read and respond to your document.
Forty-five minutes before your online chat, you will be able to read the comments on mySWS.
You and the consultant will discuss your document in a 40-minute online chat.

conbody.p: In this collaborative online conversation, you and the consultant can address your questions and concerns, talk through revisions, and strategize about what to do next.
